title: New client help
body: how can you see how many normal games youve won?

replies.body:
https://privacy.riotgames.com/en_US/

Will tell you wins and a whole bunch of other stuff related to your account.
Any kind of error? It should just give you a page with all your stats on it after you hit "Get data" and log in.
Not sure if there's a way to in the client, it might only be in the post-game lobby
Yeah, hopefully more client stats are introduced soon
